shape.description: There are two types of avatars: circle and square
shape.description_zh: 头像的形状，有圆形(circle)和正方形(square)两种

:size.description: The size of the avatar in px
:size.description_zh: 头像的尺寸大小，单位是 px

auto-fix-font-size.description: Whether the font size is automatically adjusted according to the size of the avatar
auto-fix-font-size.description_zh: 是否自动根据头像尺寸调整字体大小

:max-count.description: The maximum number of avatars displayed in the avatar group, and the extra avatars will be displayed in the form of +x.
:max-count.description_zh: 头像组最多显示的头像数量，多余头像将以 +x 的形式展示。

z-index-ascend.description: The z-index of the avatars in the avatar group is incrementing, and the default is decreasing.
z-index-ascend.description_zh: 头像组内的头像 z-index 递增，默认是递减。
